description.en:
Astrofarms is a next gen DeFi project on Polygon featuring a multi-layer, astrology themed, yield farm model. Bringing innovation to the new generation of yield farms running on Polygon and Quickswap exchange, while bridging the world of Astrology and Finance. Our aim with the current wave of yield farms, is to create an ecosystem of deflationary tokens that represent and educate about the whole Zodiac.

We introduced our community to our first token, LEO, and inspired them as we teased them with the upcoming Leo mission; our first exploration (farm) on Polygon. However, we had a surprise Loyalty Rewards System in our ""actual"" Zodiac Roadmap; this has now been updated to reflect our plans. The LEO Token became our community/governance token and has immediate utility for exploration in ALL 12 farms of the Zodiac to come!!
